game.name: NOVA
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Nova is a game set in the future, about an assistant robot trying to escape from a quarantine environment.
